title: Another senior citizen dies while waiting in line; 3rd such death in 72 hours
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Another Senior Citizen had died after collapsing while waiting in line for fuel at a filling station in Mirigama on Monday (21).
On Sunday (20) a 70-year-old person who was in a queue at a petrol station in Kadawatha had collapsed and died.
On Saturday (19), a person who was waiting in line to obtain kerosene from a fuel queue in Kandy also died after collapsing.
Another senior citizen dies while waiting in line; 3rd such death in 72 hours
MONDAY REVIEW: Wave Of ‘Peoples Protests’ Swell In Sri Lanka
